QuestData.Title: What Must Be Done
QuestData.Description: I believe we have seen this demonic corruption your friends speak of.$B$BThe Mother of Wolves has not been herself lately. Now, her pack has her surrounded.$B$BThe wolves are protecting our hunters and will not let them near. They're not likely to stop you, though.$B$BIf the alpha mother is infected with this fel-energy, then she must be put down.$B$BYou would greatly honor the Frostwolves by returning with her corpse and giving it a proper burial.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: End her suffering and bury her remains in the graveyard.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Mother of Wolves' Remains and bury it at the graveyard outside of northern Throm'var.
QuestData.RewardText: Unfortunate that there are those that would pervert such noble creatures.$B$BYou have honored their family once more, $n. They will not forget.$B$BNow it is time to take the fight directly to the Shadow Council.
